metadata.synopsis: Lae'zel remarks on Astarion's torture-poem and admires Cazador for his cleverness. Astarion is aghast.

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: Poetry as torture - your master's quite clever, Astarion. Don't you agree?

1.speaker: Astarion
1.text: You and I have very different definitions of 'clever'.
